## BitcoinsMoneyp.connect() method

Connect to the Moneyp protocol and create an `BitcoinsMoneyp` object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static connect(signerOrProvider: BitcoinsSigner | BitcoinsProvider, optionalParams?: BitcoinsMoneypConnectionOptionalParams): Promise<BitcoinsMoneyp>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signerOrProvider | [BitcoinsSigner](./lib-ethers.bitcoinssigner.md) \| [BitcoinsProvider](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsprovider.md) | Bitcoins <code>Signer</code> or <code>Provider</code> to use for connecting to the Ethereum network. |
|  optionalParams | [BitcoinsMoneypConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnectionoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters that can be used to customize the connection. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[BitcoinsMoneyp](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneyp.md)<!-- -->&gt;
